feed.title: Zyck’s Blog
feed.subtitle: "not to pursue what was easy, but to tackle the biggest and hardest problems in computer science."

entry.title: Use Tennyson’s verses to greet my new blog

link.title: Use Tennyson's verses to greet my new blog

entry.content:
use Tennyson’s verses from the poem Ulysses to greet my new blog and also to encourage myself to always stand up to difficulties in my career with code

Though much is taken, much abides; and though

We are not now that strength which in old days

Moved earth and heaven, that which we are, we are——

One equal temper of heroic hearts，

Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will

To strive, to seek, to find and not to yield.
